Plot: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.
Title: 21 Grams
Actors: Sean Penn, Naomi Watts, Danny Huston, Carly Nahon
tomatoConsensus: Alejandro González Iñárritu deftly weaves an uncommonly structured narrative with panache in 21 Grams, a stylish, haunting drama full of fine performances.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 29 wins & 71 nominations.
